Description: During a BSEE investigation into an incident involving a fire in the Heater-Treater fire tube, it was discovered that the operator failed to maintain the equipment in a safe condition.
Agency: Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement

Description: EP Energy Massachusetts, along with its contractors and engineers, agreed to pay a total of $3.25 million in settlement of allegations they overfilled an ash landfill and three wastewater treatment basins in Agawam and West Springfield, failing to pay taxes and falsely certifying that the work was done properly.

NAICS Translation: 211111: Crude Petroleum and Natural Gas Extraction

Company: EP Energy E&P Company Babcock 2-12 B4 Well
